Summary: light in sky very bright. seems to be very low at times. Faa has no idea. sheriffs, chp, have no idea. can only be seen at night. but every night and under cloud cover.

divs: sighting detailsthere is a bright light that hovers low in the sky's of california bay area. has been seen low over bay waters. over napa county, and currently over san jose \ los gatos as i write this message. can only be seen in night time hours. it seems to like to hang over the fremont\hayward hills range of mountains. officials have no idea what it is.
